ruleset.name: Custom PMD Ruleset
ruleset.description: PMD Logging Rule Set for Jetty

rule.name: AvoidAnonymousLogging
rule.description: AvoidAnonymousLogging finds instances of Anonymous logging use. This is bad form and treats logging of the system as a whole, not discrete parts that can be adjusted (attaching different levels and appenders depending on need)

property.name: xpath
property.value: //Name[ starts-with(@Image, 'Log.debug') or starts-with(@Image, 'Log.ignore') or starts-with(@Image, 'Log.info') or starts-with(@Image, 'Log.isDebugEnabled') or starts-with(@Image, 'Log.warn') or starts-with(@Image, 'org.eclipse.jetty.util.log.Log.debug') or starts-with(@Image, 'org.eclipse.jetty.util.log.Log.ignore') or starts-with(@Image, 'org.eclipse.jetty.util.log.Log.info') or starts-with(@Image, 'org.eclipse.jetty.util.log.Log.isDebugEnabled') or starts-with(@Image, 'org.eclipse.jetty.util.log.Log.warn') ]
